verses.verse: It happened in the <S%H8345>sixth<s%> <S%H8141>year,<s%> in the <S%H8345>sixth<s%> <S%H2568>month,<s%> in the fifth day of the <S%H2320>month,<s%> as I <S%H3427>sat<s%> in my <S%H1004>house,<s%> and the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H3427>sat<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3027>me,<s%> that the hand of the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Yahweh<s%> fell there on <S%H5307>me.<s%>

Then I <S%H7200>saw,<s%> and <S%H1823>behold,<s%> a likeness as the <S%H4758>appearance<s%> of <S%H784>fire;<s%> from the <S%H4758>appearance<s%> of his <S%H4975>waist<s%> and <S%H4295>downward,<s%> <S%H784>fire;<s%> and from his <S%H4975>waist<s%> and <S%H4605>upward,<s%> as the <S%H4758>appearance<s%> of <S%H2096>brightness,<s%> as it were <S%H5869>glowing<s%> <S%H2830>metal.<s%>

He put <S%H7971>forth<s%> the <S%H8403>form<s%> of a <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and <S%H3947>took<s%> me by a <S%H6734>lock<s%> of my <S%H7218>head;<s%> and the <S%H7307>Spirit<s%> lifted me <S%H5375>up<s%> between <S%H776>earth<s%> and the <S%H8064>sky,<s%> and <S%H935>brought<s%> me in the <S%H4759>visions<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> to <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> to the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of the <S%H6442>inner<s%> court that <S%H6437>looks<s%> toward the <S%H6828>north;<s%> where there was the <S%H4186>seat<s%> of the <S%H5566>image<s%> of <S%H7068>jealousy,<s%> which provokes to <S%H7069>jealousy.<s%>
<S%H3519>Behold,<s%> the glory of the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> was <S%H4758>there,<s%> according to the appearance that I <S%H7200>saw<s%> in the <S%H1237>plain.<s%>

Then he <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H1121>me,<s%> Son of <S%H120>man,<s%> lift <S%H5375>up<s%> your <S%H5869>eyes<s%> now the <S%H1870>way<s%> toward the <S%H6828>north.<s%> So I lifted <S%H5375>up<s%> my <S%H5869>eyes<s%> the <S%H1870>way<s%> toward the <S%H6828>north,<s%> and <S%H6828>see,<s%> northward of the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of the <S%H4196>altar<s%> this <S%H5566>image<s%> of <S%H7068>jealousy<s%> in the <S%H872>entry.<s%>

He <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H1121>me,<s%> Son of <S%H120>man,<s%> do you <S%H7200>see<s%> what they <S%H6213>do?<s%> even the <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H8441>abominations<s%> that the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> do <S%H6213>commit<s%> <S%H7368>here,<s%> that I should go far off from my <S%H4720>sanctuary?<s%> But you shall <S%H7725>again<s%> <S%H7200>see<s%> yet other <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H8441>abominations.<s%>
He <S%H935>brought<s%> me to the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H2691>court;<s%> and when I <S%H7200>looked,<s%> <S%H259>behold,<s%> a <S%H2356>hole<s%> in the <S%H7023>wall.<s%>

Then he <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H1121>me,<s%> Son of <S%H120>man,<s%> <S%H2864>dig<s%> now in the <S%H7023>wall:<s%> and when I had <S%H2864>dug<s%> in the <S%H7023>wall,<s%> <S%H259>behold,<s%> a <S%H6607>door.<s%>
He <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H935>me,<s%> Go in, and <S%H7200>see<s%> the <S%H7451>wicked<s%> <S%H8441>abominations<s%> that they do <S%H6213>here.<s%>

So I went <S%H935>in<s%> and <S%H7200>saw;<s%> and <S%H8403>see,<s%> every form of creeping <S%H7431>things,<s%> and <S%H8263>abominable<s%> <S%H929>animals,<s%> and all the <S%H1544>idols<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H2707>portrayed<s%> <S%H5439>around<s%> on the <S%H7023>wall.<s%>

There <S%H5975>stood<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> them <S%H7657>seventy<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> of the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> and in their <S%H8432>midst<s%> <S%H5975>stood<s%> <S%H2970>Jaazaniah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H8227>Shaphan,<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> with his <S%H4730>censer<s%> in his <S%H3027>hand;<s%> and the <S%H6282>odor<s%> of the <S%H6051>cloud<s%> of <S%H7004>incense<s%> went <S%H5927>up.<s%>

Then he <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H1121>me,<s%> Son of <S%H120>man,<s%> have you <S%H7200>seen<s%> what the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H6213>do<s%> in the <S%H2822>dark,<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> in his <S%H2315>rooms<s%> of <S%H4906>imagery?<s%> for they <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H7200>doesn't<s%> see <S%H3068>us;<s%> Yahweh has <S%H5800>forsaken<s%> the <S%H776>land.<s%>
He <S%H559>said<s%> also to <S%H7725>me,<s%> You shall again <S%H7200>see<s%> yet other <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H8441>abominations<s%> which they <S%H6213>do.<s%>

Then he <S%H935>brought<s%> me to the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%>'s <S%H1004>house<s%> which was toward the <S%H6828>north;<s%> and <S%H3427>see,<s%> there sat the <S%H802>women<s%> <S%H1058>weeping<s%> for <S%H8542>Tammuz.<s%>

Then he <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H7200>me,<s%> Have you seen <S%H1121>this,<s%> son of <S%H120>man?<s%> You shall <S%H7725>again<s%> <S%H7200>see<s%> yet <S%H1419>greater<s%> abominations than <S%H8441>these.<s%>

He <S%H935>brought<s%> me into the <S%H6442>inner<s%> <S%H2691>court<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%>'s <S%H1004>house;<s%> and <S%H6607>see,<s%> at the door of the <S%H1964>temple<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> between the <S%H197>porch<s%> and the <S%H4196>altar,<s%> were about <S%H6242>twenty<s%> - <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H376>men,<s%> with their <S%H268>backs<s%> toward the <S%H1964>temple<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and their <S%H6440>faces<s%> toward the <S%H6924>east;<s%> and they were <S%H7812>worshipping<s%> the <S%H8121>sun<s%> toward the <S%H6924>east.<s%>

Then he <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H7200>me,<s%> Have you seen <S%H1121>this,<s%> son of <S%H120>man?<s%> Is it a light <S%H7043>thing<s%> to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> that they <S%H6213>commit<s%> the <S%H8441>abominations<s%> which they <S%H6213>commit<s%> <S%H4390>here?<s%> for they have filled the <S%H776>land<s%> with <S%H2555>violence,<s%> and have <S%H7725>turned<s%> again to provoke me to <S%H3707>anger:<s%> and <S%H7971>behold,<s%> they put the <S%H2156>branch<s%> to their <S%H639>nose.<s%>

Therefore will I also <S%H6213>deal<s%> in <S%H2534>wrath;<s%> my <S%H5869>eye<s%> shall not <S%H2347>spare,<s%> neither will I have <S%H2550>pity;<s%> and though they <S%H7121>cry<s%> in my <S%H241>ears<s%> with a <S%H1419>loud<s%> <S%H6963>voice,<s%> yet will I not hear <S%H8085>them.<s%>
